comments.body: You don't need to pass the context. You just need to pass the one value you're going to use from it.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ private[spark] class WholeTextFileRDD(
       case _ =>
     }
     val jobContext = new JobContextImpl(conf, jobId)
-    inputFormat.setMinPartitions(jobContext, minPartitions)
+    inputFormat.setMinPartitions(sc, jobContext, minPartitions)

@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ private[spark] class WholeTextFileRDD(
       case _ =>
     }
     val jobContext = new JobContextImpl(conf, jobId)
-    inputFormat.setMinPartitions(jobContext, minPartitions)
+    inputFormat.setMinPartitions(sc, jobContext, minPartitions)
